name: notification
description: Send notifications to Email, DingTalk, Slack, Lark or webhook in your workflow.

parameters.usage: Please fulfill its url and message if you want to send Lark messages
parameters.name: lark

parameters.usage: Please fulfill its url and message if you want to send DingTalk messages
parameters.name: dingding

parameters.usage: Please fulfill its url and message if you want to send Slack messages
parameters.name: slack

parameters.usage: Please fulfill its from, to and content if you want to send email
parameters.name: email
